# S3easy

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Add new S3 functions and add methods quickly in the style of [usethis](https://usethis.r-lib.org/index.html).

## Installation

You can install the development version of S3easy like so:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("valentingar/S3easy")
```
